casebody.data:
STATE v. NIXON. No. COA03-1514. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed July 6, 2004. Certification Date July 26, 2004.

Case reported without published opinion. No error in part-Docket numbers 02CRS053645, 02CRS053646. Reversed and remanded in part-Docket numbers 02CRS003947; 02CRS003948.
